statements: DELETE FROM complex_analytics WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';

DELETE FROM complex_analytics WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 30
DELETE FROM sql_queries WHERE query_id = 100 AND query_text = 'SELECT * FROM table';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1001 AND order_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND product_price < 500.00;

DELETE FROM analytics_results WHERE task_id = 3 AND result_date < '2022-01-01';
